entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump @GoyaFoods Hi everyone my name is Latonya I’m from Chicago but I just moved back home from Georgia to help with my kids and grandkids and also was layed off from work due to the Coronavirus but in doing so someone I was staying with put me and my 3 & 9yr old son out please help us.
